title: 怪物装备掉落率问题
author: wifi1
txt_content:
大神看看这指令哪里有问题，怎么打都不掉头盔
summon Zombie -208 24 -46 {CustomName:"矿工僵尸",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:wooden_pickaxe},{},{},{},{id:leather_helmet}],DropChances:[0F,0F,0F,0F,0.2F],Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:Zombie,CustomName:"矿工僵尸",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:wooden_pickaxe,Count:1,Damage:1},{},{},{},{id:leather_helmet}],DropChances:[0F,0.0F,0F,0F,0.2F]}}}

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
你要掉落的物品没有加Count
summon Zombie -208 24 -46 {CustomName:"矿工僵尸",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:wooden_pickaxe},{},{},{},{id:leather_helmet,Count:1}],DropChances:[0F,0F,0F,0F,0.2F],Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:Zombie,CustomName:"矿工僵尸",CustomNameVisible:1,Equipment:[{id:wooden_pickaxe,Count:1,Damage:1},{},{},{},{id:leather_helmet,Count:1}],DropChances:[0F,0.0F,0F,0F,0.2F]}}}

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2016-8-30 19:07
你要掉落的物品没有加Count
summon Zombie -208 24 -46 {CustomName:"矿工僵尸",CustomNameVisible:1,Equip ...
@阴阳师元素祭祀 
真的好，这是summon，不是探测

replies.author: 新手摸摸大
replies.txt_content: 新手：回复是不是可以升级？升级是不是可以发帖？求解！！！
